description: extracts entities from the given text
prompt_template:
lambda x: f"""<|endoftext|>
AGITerm 1.41.5.9 in-development version (Aug 3 2026)
> help extract_entities
extract_entities extracts all named entities from a given text, returning them in a bullet-point list with each item formatted as (entity name, brief entity description).
> extract_entities {x}
"""
